channel.title: Safe wild

item.title: Safe wild
item.dc:creator: @sinzscapeserver sinzscapeserver
item.description:
@sinzscapeserver wrote:

if((AttackingOn2.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < AttackingOn2.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame()){ sM("Your level difference is too great!"); sM("You need to move deeper into the Wilderness."); faceNPC(32768 + AttackingOn); break; }
i wana make it so theres no wildy levels like fight pits
if u see theirs isinpitgame
i want to add
isinsafewild
is there any possible way to add them both

Read full topic
